name: The Gift (itch) (MigDev)
description:
The Gift was made for my 3 week The Potter's School Christmas Game Jam.                        

Big Shoutout to my teammate Lixjit for doing most of the Pixel Art in this game.

You play as a man who has heard of the birth of Jesus and you set out in search of him while avoiding Herod's guards. 

Use A and D or the Left and Right arrow keys to move and use Space to Jump.

And Most Importantly Have Fun!

Merry Christmas!

Known Bugs:

Ground in Menu glitches to high.

Sometimes the Player can get stuck beside Patrol Guards.

Lines Between Tiles sometimes.

Player Doesnt jump when space bar is pressed sometimes. (To fix this press and release the space bar quickly)

Coins sometimes are randomly received.
